quick_facts: Fed flakes and brine shrimp · Excel spot-dose x2 · ThrivePlus 0 · No water change
ramble: Malaysian trumpet snails were observed naturally cleaning the sump overflow screen, preventing buildup — marking the “Natural Balance Discovery” milestone as the system begins showing signs of self-regulation during the Post-Treatment Recovery Week.
